title: Counter Strike Source 2014.v83 - v2230303 - Autoupdate - Multila
description:
About the GAME:
===============

Counter-Strike: Source v.82 (also known as CS or simply CS:S) is a multiplayer, team-based tactical first-person shooter video game, developed by Valve and Turtle Rock Studios. It is a remake of Counter-Strike, the 1999 modification of Half-Life. Built on the Source engine, the game was released in 2004 along with Half-Life 2. The game is the most played Half-Life 2 mod, according to GameSpy.

As in the original version, Counter-Strike: Source games pit a team of counter-terrorists against a team of terrorists in a series of rounds. Each round is won by either completing a mission (such as detonating a bomb or rescuing hostages) or by eliminating all members of the opposing team. Unlike Half-Life: Source, the game is a complete remake instead of a port with additional content.	

System Requirements:
====================

Minimum: 1.7 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM, DirectX 8.1 level Graphics Card (Requires support for SSE), Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Recommended: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better), 1GB RAM, DirectX 9 level Graphics Card, Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP, Mouse, Keyboard, Internet Connection

Installation:
=============


1. Navigate to the downloaded torrent
2. Run the file Counter-Strike-Source.v84.exe
3. Choose your language
4. Follow the instructions of the installer
5. After the installation,the CSS-Updater.exe will update your game automatically,please do not cancel this operation(Only few minutes are needed)


Update Game Support:
====================

If you cannot join servers newer than your game,please run the: CSS-Updater.exe again and your game will be updated to the latest version.
